scripts.say: Port - Exercise Area
I'm astonished. They responded to my strategies by immediately redeploying their forces and adjusting their weaponry with precision.
Perhaps that's not very surprising, though. Who would be more familiar with this fleet's capabilities than the Commander, after all?
Suruga, how does the battle fare?
We are in an engagement on the frontlines. As for how it's faring... not quite as expected. Our opponents are advancing faster than I expected.
Though it would be possible to sortie our main fleet to meet theirs head-on, avoiding that engagement to lure them deeper in might be the wiser option.
Ah, you plan to wait until their advance is at its breaking point to strike them full-force.
Indeed. However, I still haven't decided who would be best suited to lure the opponent towards us...
Perhaps it would be best to withdraw our vanguard fleet...
There's no need for that!
Yukikaze?
If you need someone to lure our opponents in, then Yukikaze the Great will do it! Just give me the order!
I appreciate your initiative, but considering the speed of the opponent's advance, our fleet wouldn't even be ready to intercept them.
In other words, we'll also need some way of buying time while luring them. Do you have any ideas on how to do that, Yukikaze?
Heheh! We don't need any cheap tricks for that! This is nothing that cannot be solved with Yukikaze the Great's extraordinary luck!
... Come again?
Well, that's what I would normally say, but I'll be counting on you to back me up if anything goes wrong.
I, I see... Then, I will do whatever I can to support you.
Hahahah! You two seem like quite the promising pair! Now go out there and seize victory!
You can count on Yukikaze to get it done! Wa hah hah!
... A-affirmative!
